forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain, some heavy early. High around 10C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 75 to 125mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain, heavy at times early. High around 50F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 3 to 5 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 35F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 32F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
